website_summaries.verdict: If it's front traction you're looking for, you need these pads from Ho Stevie! The manufacturer recommends spreading them equally across your board.
pros: Pieces weigh less than 3.7 ounces together, which is probably less than the wax used for front traction on your board
Measures 16 inches tall and 14.5 inches wide when all 4 pieces are laid side by side
cons: May take a few tries to get used to this instead of wax

customer_reviews.title: Best snowboard stomp pad u can buy !!!  Yes, SNOWBOARD :)
customer_reviews.text: Well, i surfed in my youth but these days i mostly slalom ski and snowboard. Snowboard stomp pads r expensive when u hav a lot of boards and u also want a big pad (so your foot doesnt miss it). Most snowboard stomp pads r small. So i ordered these surfboard traction pads and couldnt be more pleased !! They work really well and r so economical cause i cut them up and outfit 4 snowboards w.one order. Just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made products
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pad, it’s great! It definitely feels good under my feet. it’s got a great designe of palm trees which makes it very tropical on my surfboard.
customer_reviews.author: Chucky

customer_reviews.title: 5 star front stomp pad!,,
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pad! It’s larger and wider than most front traction pads and for half the price.Ive bought 3 of em and will be buying more.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Uncle mike

customer_reviews.title: perfect for any length board
customer_reviews.text: I have a long board and these turned out perfect for some extra traction. I use the pad towards center back of the board and wax towards the front, it makes a good grip for small and bigger waves.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for staples kite surfing
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and traction for strapless kite surfing! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Brennen DeFiore

customer_reviews.title: Great traction pad
customer_reviews.text: This is on the board and has been in the water four or five times. My son loves it and he’s happy about using less wax!
customer_reviews.author: IMMN

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like wax so I bought the traction pads and works perfectly. I can do turns and everything I want. 100% recommende!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lunares

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Order came in time and the material and adhesive are high-quality at an affordable price. I'd recommend Steve's products to any of my friends that have an interest in surfing! :)
customer_reviews.author: cody (Hawaii)

customer_reviews.title: 7’6” funboard
customer_reviews.text: Got over having wax melting inside my car. Traction pad is very good quality and very grippy. No more wax, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice traction pad for about half the price of similar products from popular surf brands. Got the front and tail pad for my surfboard and I will be getting a front pad for my Wakesurf board and other surfboard. It will be nice to not need wax again.
customer_reviews.author: Kshred7

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as top brands but less than half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Torin

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of Creatures, just as good
customer_reviews.text: Just as quality as the creatures of leisure pad at half the price, stoked to say bye bye to wax. This thing is solid, super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this traction! Works really well but not course against the skin. I have had this traction for about a year on a surf board I have used a lot and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good adhesive and feels quality.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the front of my bass boat so I would not slip and they work awesome. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Brett Dreessen

customer_reviews.title: Great Traction Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent traction pad at an amazing price. Used it a couple times already and was really surprised at the grip. I've always been skeptical of front traction pads...but these are comfortable when paddling and provide superior grip in comparison to wax.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Good Traction at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just added the front traction to my deck. Had the matching rear traction for over a year now and that had performed well. Haven't surfed it yet but I anticipate it to do well as the rear traction has met my expectations. Ho Stevie...start making your fins available in 5 fin sets!
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: traction
customer_reviews.text: it does provide a traction especially when wet. Always allow 24Hr to adhere
customer_reviews.author: Bleu

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We ve looked all over local stores for this item.. Your selection was perfect and what my son was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome strips They stay on great and good hand gripping ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome strips They stay on great and good hand gripping pattern as well
customer_reviews.author: Danette F.

customer_reviews.title: His nails do not seem to be causing any damage to the pads so they are pretty tough.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how you would want! I purchased the pads for the front of my kayak for grub support for my dog. His nails do not seem to be causing any damage to the pads so they are pretty tough.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: everything is good quality and fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: 2nd product that I've ordered from Stevie. So far, everything is good quality and fairly priced. Headed down to try out the traction pad now.
customer_reviews.author: Mason J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great tranaction pad
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time The pad was as described on the site
customer_reviews.author: Ronen Fidel

customer_reviews.title: My order came in fast
customer_reviews.text: Good price, quick turnaround, and products works and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Daly

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Product is really cool! Looks great on my son’s board! Fantastic customer service!! You should DEFINITELY purchase from this company!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good service. Can’t ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: ☝️A OKAY!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cross patterns on this traction pad, it offers more grip than most other pads do.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used them yet but I like how they look and being from New England and ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet but I like how they look and being from New England and traveling and surfing warmer climates just makes it easier not having to scrap and re wax.
customer_reviews.author: ian leitao

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it arrived very quickly. The company is very helpful and included a PDF file to help me install it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Traction pad
customer_reviews.text: Great product working well, but the glue on the pad is already breaking off
customer_reviews.author: aviv carmi

customer_reviews.title: Grips
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in product, grips didn't hold. Ended up throwing away.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Markiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: I used them on my skimboard. They work great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Knuth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons scimboard - sticks perfectly we are very happy

customer_reviews.title: ... adjust to it but now my front foot feels like it’s home
customer_reviews.text: Took a few waves to adjust to it but now my front foot feels like it’s home

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Thanks Stevie for the amazing products that are affordable for surfer Dads who’s kids require the best products!! You guys are rad!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Krattiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank You. I'm using them on my seadoo. They keep our ankles from getting bruised.
customer_reviews.author: john Seymour

customer_reviews.title: BUY and SHRED !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for a awesome price 🤘🏼Got two of these sets and the rear traction pad set for my new 6’6 retro twin fish ! Go HO Stevie!
customer_reviews.author: tyler papke

product_meta.title: Ho Stevie! Front Traction Pad for Surfboards and Skimboards [Choose Color]
feature_bullets: 🕯 ELIMINATE THE NEED FOR WAX - When you add a front traction pad to your surfboard, you don’t need to use wax for grip. This means no messy melted wax on your car or at the beach when you leave your surfboard in the sun.
⚖️ LIGHTWEIGHT - All four pieces of the front traction pad weigh a total of 3.7oz, which is likely less than the weight of wax on your surfboard.
👣 FULL SIZE PAD - 16” tall and 14.5” wide when all 4 pieces are laid side by side. We recommend spreading the pads apart equally across the width of your surfboard, as shown in the pictures.
🥇 PREMIUM QUALITY - Same material and pattern as our rear traction pads. Powerful 3M adhesive provides maximum stick to your board.
💯 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: As with all of our products, if you are not completely satisfied for ANY reason with your front traction pad, simply return it within 30 days for a full refund.
